attributes.action: Start deporting illegal migrants from this countries hotels
attributes.additional_details: Because the public have never been consulted about tax payers money paying for them
attributes.background: Start deporting illegal migrants from this countries hotels

rejection.details:
The UK Government already has a policy of deporting people who do not have a legal right to reside in the UK.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Stop housing asylum seekers who entered the UK illegally in hotels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628324
